input.title: Azure Key Vaults have open network access (AZ-003)
input.body:
# Azure Key Vault Open Network Access Risk (AZ-003)

## Description
Multiple Key Vaults are configured with open network access, posing a high security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-vault-01
- seobaike-vault

## Recommended Action
Restrict network access to these Key Vaults by enabling private endpoints or firewall rules to allow only trusted IPs/subnets.

Please assign to Azure admin for manual remediation.

Level: High
Module: Azure

input.title: Azure AI Services have public network access (AZ-004)
input.body:
# Azure AI Services Public Network Access Risk (AZ-004)

## Description
Multiple AI services are configured with public network access enabled, posing a medium security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-openai-australiaeast
- ai-empire-openai-eastus
- ai-empire-openai-japaneast
- ai-empire-openai-southeastasia
- ai-empire-openai-swedencentral
- ai-empire-openai-uksouth
- ai-empire-openai-westeurope
- ai-empire-openai-westus

## Recommended Action
Disable public network access and configure private endpoints for these AI services.

Please assign to Azure admin for manual remediation.

Level: Medium
Module: Azure

input.title: GitHub Repository is Public (GH-001)
input.body:
# GitHub Repository Visibility Risk (GH-001)

## Description
The repository is set to public, exposing source code and potentially sensitive information.

## Recommended Action
Change the repository visibility to private. Ensure that only authorized users have access.

Please assign to GitHub admin for manual remediation.

Level: High
Module: GitHub

input.content:
# Azure Security Issues

## Problem: AZ-003 - Key Vault Open Network Access
- Severity: High
- Description: Key Vaults allow open network access, risking unauthorized access.
- Affected: ai-empire-vault-01, seobaike-vault
- Remediation: Restrict to private endpoints or IP whitelisting. Manual fix required as Azure CLI tool is read-only.
- Attempted Fix: Failed to create GitHub issue due to 403 permissions error.

## Problem: AZ-004 - AI Services Public Network Access
- Severity: Medium
- Description: AI services exposed to public networks.
- Affected: Multiple regions (australiaeast, eastus, etc.)
- Remediation: Disable public access and use private endpoints. Manual fix required.
- Attempted Fix: Failed to create GitHub issue due to 403 permissions error.

# GitHub Security Issues

## Problem: GH-001 - Public Repository
- Severity: High
- Description: Repository is public, exposing source code.
- Remediation: Set repository to private. Manual fix required.
- Attempted Fix: Failed to create GitHub issue due to 403 permissions error.
